title: 10 Reasons Why India is NOT the Next China
selftext: What are your thoughts on this? Do you think India will ever catch up to China in terms of economic development?
comments: The only thing this video is talking about. China has a bigger economy than India, India has less export, less manufacturing, not good infrastructure. But nowhere it gave the point to prove india can't overtake China. This video is simply saying China has a bigger economy than India, nothing else.

True we can't enslave a whole Muslim community to slave work like in  Xinjiang detention centres or we would be a dictatorship. Also we can't harvest organs at a large scale without consent of a community.
You are the one peddling debunked propaganda
So you think that Xinjiang detention centres are a lie?
